text:
@realDonaldTrump @POTUS you forgot to add that it won't be your fault if anybody gets sick and dies because, as @SecAzar put it, it's the victim's fault for being fat and sick in the first place. Way to blame the victims!

America First ... in covid19 deaths. 90,000+ and climbing.
